name: Noku
additional_notices: Kindly be aware of liquidity-related risks. This notice is not directed at any project in particular, and is more of a cautionary reminder.

description.en:
Noku develops blockchain protocols. Nokuchain is a scalable, EVM-compatible blockchain designed to increase NFT performance for Gaming applications.
NOKU is the native currency of Nokuchain.

ico_data.description: Noku provides instruments for trading, saving, and making payments. With the Noku platform, everyone can create their own crypto economy, without having to write code. The crypto economy needs to be simplified for everyone. This is the Noku goal.
